result.eng: Do you like eating in restaurants?
result.ga: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialanna
result.orig: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialanna
result.html: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialannaDo you like eating in restaurants?
result.ponchtml: An maiṫ liḃ ḃeiṫ ag iṫe i mbialannaDo you like eating in restaurants?

result.html: Slán libhBye.
result.ponchtml: Slán liḃBye.

result.eng: Is your husband with you in An Spidéal?
result.ga: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa Spidéal
result.orig: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa Spidéal
result.html: An bhfuil d'fhear céile libh sa SpidéalIs your husband with you in An Spidéal?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil d'ḟear céile liḃ sa SpidéalIs your husband with you in An Spidéal?

result.eng: What day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ga: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.orig: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taisteal
result.html: Cén lá den tseachtain ab fhearr libh taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?
result.ponchtml: Cén lá den tseaċtain ab ḟearr liḃ taistealWhat day of the week would you prefer to travel?

result.eng: I hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.
result.ga: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libh
result.orig: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libh
result.html: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libhI hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.
result.ponchtml: Is fuaṫ liom a ḃeiṫ ag siopadóireaċt aċ go n-éirí sé liḃI hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.

result.eng: Did you like Ros an Mhíl?
result.ga: Ar thaithnigh Ros an Mhíl libh
result.orig: Ar thaithnigh Ros an Mhíl libh
result.html: Ar thaithnigh Ros an Mhíl libhDid you like Ros an Mhíl?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṫaiṫniġ Ros an Ṁíl liḃDid you like Ros an Mhíl?

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.eng: Off to bed with the lot of you!
result.html: Greadaigí libh a luíOff to bed with the lot of you!
result.ponchtml: Greadaigí liḃ a luíOff to bed with the lot of you!
